document.full_text: mexico's state-run oil company pemex is suing 11 u.s. companies for buying up to $300 million of fuel stolen by drug gangs and smuggled across the u.s.-mexico border, court documents showed.
document.title: mexico's pemex sues u.s. firms over fuel smuggling
lines_and_colors: mexico's state-run oil company pemex is suing 11 u.s. companies for buying up to $300 million of fuel stolen by drug gangs and smuggled across the u.s.-mexico border, court documents showed.
